SongName: (No One Knows Me) Like the Piano
Lyric:
[by:逛逛逛老驴]
[ti:(No One Knows Me) Like the Piano]
[ar:Sampha]
[al:Process]
[by:逛逛逛老驴]
[00:30.82]No one knows me but piano in my mother's home
[00:38.61]
[00:45.71]You assure me I have something, some people call it soul
[00:53.70]
[01:00.68]And you drop, top the sky, oh you ride, when i was three years old
[01:08.36]
[01:15.56]No one knows me like the piano in my mother's home
[01:22.82]
[01:29.56]You know I left, I flew the nest
[01:35.62]
[01:36.62]And you know I won't be alone
[01:43.62]
[01:44.48]And in my chest you know me best
[01:50.82]
[01:51.52]And you know I'll be back home
[01:59.08]
[02:15.00]An angel by her side, all the times I knew we couldn't cope
[02:23.14]
[02:29.92]They said that it's her time, no tears in sight, I kept the feeling's close
[02:38.18]
[02:44.82]And you took hold of me and never, never, never let me go
[02:53.02]
[02:59.76]Cause no one knows me like the piano in my mother's home
[03:06.99]
[03:12.56]in my mother's home
[03:14.11]
[03:15.69]
